alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:10PM MDT until June 22 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 410 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southeastern Centennial, or 14 miles southeast of Denver, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Arapahoe Park around 415 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
